channel.title: Portforwarding Help *READ BEFORE GRIPING WITH LINKS*
channel.description: :confused: I have a Verizon Wirless Mifi2200... I Absolutly have no idea how to portforward it... iv tried every tut and still this thing is different then most regular routers. If you know maybe you can fix it or you have one and know how please comment! i have teamviewer or skype if u need that to help me Thanks.

item.title: Portforwarding Help *READ BEFORE GRIPING WITH LINKS*
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

What you might want to try, is logging into your router and going to the “gaming” section of your router or the “portforward” section.

If that doesnt work, then you could also try, portforward.com, and then go find your router, and follow the steps.

Read full topic
